ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge the staff of the Experimental Station in the Department of Animal and Poultry Production, Faculty of Agriculture, South Valley University, for their generous assistance during the course of the study as well as N. Wahl and P. Jacquemien for their excellent support in the laboratory. Partial financial support was provided by funds allocated to the Institute of Animal Science, University of Bonn.
